description: Contains metadata about how records in a display_collection were viewed on a specific day

searches.description: Number of times a record from this collection was part of a search result

record_views.description: Number of times a record page for a record from this collection was viewed

user_set_views.description: Number of times a record from this collection was viewed in a user set

total_views.description: Cumulative count of all record views for this collection
